attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is an IT Contractor called Fred.
He isn't allowed to work as a sole trader so he must setup a limited company (FredCo).

FredCo charges and pays VAT (tax)
FredCo pays corporation tax (tax)
FredCo pay employers NI (tax)
Fred pays employees NI (tax)
Fred pays income tax (tax)
Fred pays capital gains tax (tax)
Fred also applies for working tax credits (tax adjustment)
(there are probably other taxes fred is unaware of).

Fred wonders why there are 7 or more kinds of tax as he dreams of a utopian land where he pays 'employment tax' and he can work it out himself without consulting civil servants.

Shall we help Fred?

rejection.details: This petition overlaps several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/WholeTaxSystem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
